name: ToonSquid Project
summary: Learn about .TSPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ToonSquid is a 2D digital animation app developed by Keiwan Donyagard. It allows animators to create layer-based animations, which can consist of animated drawings, colored backgrounds, audio clips, and videos.

Animation projects created in ToonSquid are saved as TSPROJ files. When creating a new TSPROJ file, an animator can specify various project properties, such as the project's width, height, frames per second, and default workflow. All of a user's TSPROJ files appear on ToonSquid's Projects screen. From this screen, users can also export and import TSPROJ files.

instructions: You can open a TSPROJ file with ToonSquid (iOS). From the app's Projects screen, select Import. Then, navigate to and import your TSPROJ file. You'll then be able to select and open your TSPROJ file from the Projects screen.

You can use ToonSquid to export the animation a TSPROJ file contains as an .MP4, .MOV, or .GIF file. You can also export one or more of your animation's frames as a .PNG, .JPEG, .TIFF, .BMP, or .TGA file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
